price: Kuma imma wata fizga daga Shaiɗan ta fizge ka, sai ka nẽmi tsari ga Allah. Lalle ne shi, Mai jĩ ne, Masani.
arabic: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ نَزۡغٞ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-immā yanzaghannaka mina al-shayṭāni nazghun fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi innahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
translations: an evil suggestion comes to you
